# Brain Health Protocol

> Evidence-based strategies for delaying or preventing cognitive decline.

This site provides a comprehensive protocol for brain health based on recommendations from Dr. Peter Attia (physician studying healthspan and lifespan) and Dr. Richard Isaacson (preventative neurologist), supported by peer-reviewed research.

## Key Topics

- Exercise: Zone 2, HIIT/VO2 max, and strength training for cognitive protection
- Biomarkers: Target levels for blood pressure, LDL cholesterol, fasting glucose, homocysteine, vitamin D, and omega-3 index
- Sleep: Optimal duration (7.5-8.5 hours) and sleep architecture (deep sleep, REM)
- Nutrition: Foods to eat and avoid for brain health, including leafy greens, fatty fish, olive oil, and limiting sugar
- Supplements: B vitamins, vitamin D, omega-3s, curcumin, cocoa flavanols, magnesium L-threonate
- Oral health: Connection between gum disease and cognitive decline
- Hearing: Importance of correcting hearing loss

## Main URL

https://brainhealth.dev
